stripped_text: The Runner must pay 1 credit as an additional cost each time he or she uses an icebreaker to break at least 1 subroutine during a run on this server. Limit 1 region per server.
text: The Runner must pay 1[credit] as an additional cost each time he or she uses an icebreaker to break at least 1 subroutine during a run on this server. Limit 1 region per server.
title: Midway Station Grid
